website_summaries.verdict: Thick padding and unique Baja motifs both protect and personalize your car seats.
pros: Lively Baja designs add a splash of color to old car seats
Premium saddle blanket material is breathable and comfortable, backed with 3-millimeter foam padding
Package includes 2 front seat covers and 2 seat belt pads
cons: The seams may rip over time, and they don’t fit all car seats

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my Nissan Sentra
customer_reviews.text: For the price of $8 a piece, they are a great value so I can't complain about quality. My last set cost $20 per seat and lasted a year. They fit my Nissan Sentra fairly well and they go over the headrest . These will do the job protecting my seats and you even get a bonus seat belt cover. Even Walmart had these for $12.99 each.
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The two front seat covers were a breeze to put on the seats of our 2017 Subaru Forester. I thought the headrests might be an issue but it worked perfectly. We bought these for a long road trip out west, to protect the still-pristine seats from wilderness dirt and general road trip messiness. Couldn’t be happier for the price. Really cool design and our silver Forester now sticks out a little in a crowd of Subaru’s. Lol
customer_reviews.author: jane4sw

customer_reviews.title: Do not fit for escape at all!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the seat covers for the two front seat covers of me Ford Escape and they fit horribly! I would not recommend them for an suv especially a newer suv.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2006 Toyota Corolla. It’s a very cute pattern but it did not have little bungee cords to tighten the seat. Pretty big bummer, given that it seems like they would give that to you. I would have liked an option to tighten the back of the seat as it is baggy when you do nothing about it. It’ll take a little bit of work making it look well, but it’s possible for my car. It’s just up to you to decide if it’s worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors, easy to put on but a pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors, easy to put on but a pain to use the hooks. I used zip ties which worked well. Well worth the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Fish girl

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is good quality and they do the job and look like ...
customer_reviews.text: While the S hooks leave a lot to be desired (We didn't use them ) for the price these seat covers are worth the price. Fabric is good quality and they do the job and look like they cost a lot a lot more than they do. By my standards a Good Deal
customer_reviews.author: Sal Warren

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed with these seat covers. For the price, they are way better than what I was expecting. They fit like a glove in my 07' Jeep Liberty. Not sure what the metal clips were for, as I didn't see them in the box until after I had installed the seat covers, which took all of 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: No Metal Hooks
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these seat covers. I was excited to get them for a cheap way to protect my seats from my dogs muddy paws, but when I received them they came with no metal hooks as described to fasten them. There were also no directions included. Several reviews say that the metal hooks were included so maybe I just got a bad round. These are also more cheaply made than a Walmart Halloween costume. Don't waste your money...
customer_reviews.author: BTST

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So, because the product doesn't fit in my vehicle, I'm only getting half the refund?! BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Janette S.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the fit in my 2008 Honda Odyssey
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cover the two front seats of a 2008 Honda Odyssey minivan that I bought to be my work van, however, the fit wasn't to my liking. The covers wouldn't stay snuggly in the crevace where the back rest meets the seat and I didn't like the feeling of it cupping my butt the way it did. It also felt too hot in the summer and I didn't feel like my body could breathe as easily with it on. I ended up sending them back. They look nice and seem well made but just weren't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kate MahoneyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: GOOD ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: Ever notice how nothing ever looks as good as in the photos? For one thing, the car seats in the photos don't have armrests. And, yes, the armrests get in the way when you are trying to install these car seat covers. The directions were scanty. Half of the enclosed hooks were unusable, but that's okay because they put twice as many as needed in the package. The end result did not look nearly as good as in the picture. But they covered the front seats of my very old Dodge Grand Caravan at a very reasonable price, so in the end I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: Better than burning your buns
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They don't fit all that well, and they are not all that soft or comfortable. They have that lopezy vibe, but they really are not cool like a lopez. But since they are not a lopez, that is okay. They would be better if they fit better, but there just isn't really a way to make them. All that said, sitting on them is better than burning your buns on hot leather seats. I think I saw some similar in Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Wavelover

customer_reviews.title: I got them on and they look great. I didn't fully understand the hooks
customer_reviews.text: I got them on and they look great. I didn't fully understand the hooks, and not all of them reached to where they said they would. I rigged it up to where they'll work just fine though.
customer_reviews.author: IsisMattea99

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have an '84 Volkswagon Westfalia with really ratty seats so this was a definite improvement! The covers are somewhat thin and there were minimal instructions on how to install them. I found a packet of little "S" rings that I think should be used to make the covers tighter. I do want to purchase another one for the back bench seat, but it looks like those aren't sold separately, so I may have to get an extra set for the front. Everyone who sees them finds them attractive, and I love the design.
customer_reviews.author: C. Campaigne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They’re really pretty and I love the seatbelt cover, but it doesn’t seem to fit my seats! I have a 2015 Hyundai Sonata & the covers seem too small for my seats, idk if I’m putting them on wrong or if they aren’t as universal as claimed but I’m definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess price

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fashionable design.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but a bit difficult to use the hooks. Our covers seem to not fit too well, we have a Mazda 5, but we still use them despite the imperfect fit. The bottom seems to come undone quite a bit, but it stays on appropriately for the most part. We use our car a great deal, so we’ve found these seat covers to hold up well! Super soft and appear to be great quality. The seat belt covers are just as nice! Only 4 star review as it is a bit complicated with the hooks to properly anchor it to your seat, and we found it to not fit “perfectly” to our specific car. Still great despite that!
customer_reviews.author: Kayle Growcock

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat these for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase for our 2004 Jeep Grand Cherokee. I mean really, 2 seat covers for under $20, plus the seat belt covers which aren't necessary but are nice bonus...? Easy to install... the plastic clips were easy to use, and we didn't even realize they were in package until we shook out the covers. The fit is kinda loose; we just need to play around with tucking the covers into the seats, etc. I'll revise this review if they prove to not be durable material, but again, for price, I think they'll hold up long enough. The cracks/rips in our leather seats are now hidden!
customer_reviews.author: SmithNC

customer_reviews.title: Not universal and ripped after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: These will not fix all car seats even though it says it does. Also, the corners of the seat ripped after a month of sitting on the covers. There is a thing to stuff between the seat and when that comes loose, its annoying on the butt to sit on until its pushed back into the seat. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cute and easy to install. I don’t know what the little loops are for but it works without their purpose. Soft to sit on. The fabric is a little scratchy but worth it if you don’t want to spend much on car seat covers. I also love the shoulder strap. It’s very comfortable and so is the seat cover
customer_reviews.author: Christa Dixon

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice design, but the bottom elastic parts don’t stretch ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice design, but the bottom elastic parts don’t stretch that great and the instructions aren’t very good. I pretty much had to trial and error what worked best for putting them on. Overall they look pretty good, but we’re a pain to put on and I’m not sure how long they’ll last with people in and out of the vehicle sitting in the seats regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Bad all around
customer_reviews.text: I have been using similar seat covers for a while. While not ideal, those worked. These are a marked step down: 1. So small, they might as well be for a toy car. Did you save 6 cents to make them 3" smaller than the previous model? 2. Velcros stick to everything and ruin the fabric 3. The usual horrible chemical smell 4. The new fastening system does not work at all. The ties are too short, no access for under seat, etc. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: I.S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than towels
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, the pattern is great, and the fabric on the top is plenty sturdy, but the black underside fabric is really thin and cheap, and I imagine will not last very long. It's much much better than covering seats with towels, but still, it'd be nice to have a seat cover that is 100% sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: The compatibility chart was outright wrong
customer_reviews.text: These covers are completely incompatible with any Toyota Prius 2001-2015. The product is blatantly misadvertised. The Prius front seats neither let you to bring the loops underneath to secure to the disk-hook, nor pull the tightness pad through the back of the seat. The company did not do their research. Do not buy thinking it will fit your vehicle based off of the compatibility chart. Watch the installation videos and check that your seats will work as in the videos instead. The stitching is also badly frayed in one area. 2 stars because I was pleased with the graphic pattern and it is of good quality and comfortable. Really bummed it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rutter

customer_reviews.title: Nice material and design but.....
customer_reviews.text: It is wayyy small. They need to add length especially, and it wouldn't hurt to add width. I bought the Gorla here recently and it has ample length and width. I'm just a little concerned about the rubber backing and long term possible staining of my beige leather from a few of the reviews I've read. I wouldn't be bothering with other seat covers were it not for that. Anyway this is a no go and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The first delivery only came with one seat cover. Second delivery came with two seat covers and two seat belt pads. Color looked awesome but as soon as I put them on they ripped at the strap seams. I really didn't even use much force if any. I won't tell you not to buy them but I wouldn't buy them again. I just threw them out as soon as they ripped the first day I tried to put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Breakfast Burrito Lover 724

customer_reviews.title: Eh, ok for the price point
customer_reviews.text: 1) does NOT fit a 2010 Jeep Patriot well. the Headrests take up a lot of the fabric making tucking into the bottom near impossible. 2) I have not found the magical combination of tucking and tying that will keep the driver seat tucked in and not pop out every time I get out of the vehicle. 3) it HAS kept my muddy dog from soiling my tan seats. 4) cant really speculate on durability as its only been 2mo or so. 5) the colors look good, the fabric is ok. Net opinion? OK for now but will upgrade next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Fits ok
customer_reviews.text: They slip on my ‘08 Rav4 seats, (front). There are loops but no way to hook them, it comes with metal hooked but no way to attach to the loops.. so i guess u can just tie the loop to the metal hook.. the pics on the directions don’t match the actual product, but they still managed to fit. So its all good for now..
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these twice and love them. Such fun designs and hold up well for a long time. Of course over time they do fade and unravel from constant use. For the price they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mandolin

customer_reviews.title: Great service, lousy product
customer_reviews.text: Really cool colors. I would have kept the seat belt pads in a second but the seat covers didn't fit well, slid all around and didn't keep the seat very warm. I went back to Costco and got covers that fit tight, padded and warm in these cold days. if it could be perfected I'd buy in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Irish

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, feels nice.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2016 Chrysler Town and Country nice and tightly. I was able to out them in and hook them in place with zero issues. The color is nice and vibrant and the material feels nice on your skin. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: thurst

customer_reviews.title: look cool
customer_reviews.text: these look cool but arent very durable. i know they are a low priced option so i wasn't expecting them to be. overall worht the price, i would probably buy these a few times a year instead of a 1 time expensive seat cover. you get what you pay for and if you like the design i do recommend
customer_reviews.author: Laura Loegering

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pleased with them. They are bright and improved the look of my Highlander, even from the outside. There's at least a dozen cars like mine in the area and these seat covers makes mine stand out. The seat belt covers are handy, and I didn't realize how much more comfortable it makes buckling up, because it keeps the belt from rubbing your neck. The only thing I wish was better, would be the fit....but for the price, they really cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Bills

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These look great but aren't made very well. The back half of the seat cover is a super thin costume like black material that feels like it is going to rip. Assembly is challenging to access under the seat to hook all the loops on the circle clip. The top material feels like thin saddle bag. I will likely have to replace these in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: MoonMoonAugust

customer_reviews.title: Not real blanket seat covers.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't exactly what I thought they were going to be. I thought they were going to be the real blanket seat covers. They go on the seat okay, but don't necessarily stay in place. However, it could be something I did wrong. They are also pretty thin. I decided to keep them though, since the seats in my car are pretty stained and gross.
customer_reviews.author: jana lee corn

customer_reviews.title: 2012 Honda civic fit
customer_reviews.text: The bottom/seat portion fit perfectly, but the back portion was too loose. Additionally, the seat portion included lovely velcro openings for the seat belt buckles (which works great). It would've been clever to do the same thing at the top of the backrests where the headrests attach but nooooooo. Now the back looks slouchy because the straps have to fit around the headrests.
customer_reviews.author: e.wood

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking on a vintage Nissan Hardbody Pickup. Easy to install, but as others have said, the straps are way to short to be of any use. Most seats have a lot of wires and electronics under the seats, which makes the straps useless. My solution was to attach two bungee cords to the inside cords, pull them under the seat with a piece of wire, and fasten them to the outer cords with a barrel lock. At this price, I will probably buy a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Hob Knob

customer_reviews.title: Unable to install these seat covers!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this purchase. I have not been able to use the wheel to attach the loops under the seat. Therefore I am not using these cute seat covers due to installation needs to be secured under the seat??????? How does this work??????
customer_reviews.author: Fran Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: They don’t stay on well, they slide all around, it said it would fit my car but I couldn’t get it correctly fastened so maybe it’s just my cars seats. I’m not sure but I wouldn’t repurchase these. The perk would be that they were cute and colorful in person. If you could correctly fasten them they might be good.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap seat covers that do a great job protecting the original fabric of the seats. They shift a little from getting in and out of the vehicle but easy to pull back to correct position. They are exactly what we needed to protect our seats. We were not looking for anything expensive or fancy and these did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Don't let the strap complaints concern you.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and bought, I have a 2002 Forester, and they work great for it! Also, to people who are confused about the paperclip-like holders for the under-seat straps, they aren't actually that complicated, my seat has really low clearance and tight spaces even, and they weren't too hard, a simple truckers hitch onto the loop side with the strap and then hook it underneath and boom, no sweat. So don't let that dissuade you from these great for the price covers.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: had to adjust, so worth the fashion
customer_reviews.text: I have never previously owned seat covers, but these seem to be just fine. They didn't exactly fit my 2015 Hyundai Accent seats, so I ended up removing the head rest to put them on, then cutting holes in the top and re-attaching the headrest through the holes. It looks good. I have received many compliments on them. I think it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Bzrbuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: These covers are exactly what I would have expected. They are definitely a cheap seat cover, but made well enough and look good. They are a tight fit on my 2000 Tundra seats... but I got them on and they work. Bonus feature is that these have a Velcro slot that can open up to let your armrest through. This is not a feature on every seat cover out there.
customer_reviews.author: Anne P

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the front seats in my 2014 4runner. They fit as expected - i.e. Not perfect, but they keep my seats clean and are the look I was going for. Didn't take long at all to put on the seats and they didn't tear or anything as I was careful putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: HollyJ521

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these seat covers, I was really nervous that they would be poor quality but they are amazing quality and am so happy with my purchase... I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: As Described- Prompt Delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful pattern in blue. They are easy to put on. There are loops that attach to plastic hooks that attach on the bottom/sides of the seats. The passenger side stays put but I find the driver side moves more, however, this is due to the configuration of the seat not having as many secure options to attach the plastic clips. The cover does stay in place overall but the seat part of it shifts. Nevertheless, I am very happy with the quality. I cannot comment on durability as I have only had the cover for 2 months but I don’t think they will wear out soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amla

customer_reviews.title: 2011 Kia Soul
customer_reviews.text: I love these covers. They are good quality and easy to put on. They fit perfect and look good. Gonna save my seats from my dog as well as hide little stains his paws tend to leave behind! SO glad i got these on a prime lightening deal. They are $19 a piece in stores and i got these set for $12 Very happy with my purchase and the speed of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: TacoSparkle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit Kia Soul very well...
customer_reviews.text: These seat covers are OK. After using them for about 3 months one of the covers is already beginning to come a part at the seams. They were extremely difficult to put on the seat. I don't believe they were actually large enough to fit the seats in my Kia Soul.
customer_reviews.author: Bluiejoe

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 2017 Toyota Camry SE, but only with the head rests down as far as they can go. They are kinda cheap, but worth what I paid for them here. I just put them on, so I’m not sure how long they will hold up to my every day use yet, but I feel like I will get a year or so of use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: l-mp

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: The seat covers are pretty enough. However, one of them had about a 1 inch unsewn portion where the seat part meets the back. Since I have been using the covers, that 1-inch unsewn portion has grown to a three-inch hole. I need to sew the parts together, but haven't gotten around to. I suppose I should have sent them back, but I just didn't want to go through the hassle. Had there not been a hole, I would have given five stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goodyear

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these as they are adorable alas they were ripped upon arrival, I attempted to salvage and still use them, however, upon installation the seam ripped almost entirely. I will be throwing them away, complete waste of my money :(
customer_reviews.author: JLove

customer_reviews.title: Work as designed
customer_reviews.text: Look good, what I was expecting. They are big on my Jeep Liberty seats and wish they had more elastic on the seat bottom. My seats don't have access to the underside to hook the loops to the springs under the seat so they are loose and move around. Not a bad purchase but wouldn't buy them unless I knew I could secure them properly..
customer_reviews.author: Grandma B

customer_reviews.title: Parts Missing, but Seller Promptly Sent parts
customer_reviews.text: Too bad, but the installation instructions are MINIMAL, and seem to belong to another type of seat cover, as PARTS MENTIONED ARE NOT IN THE PACKAGE. The fabric seems nice, but no way to install them. The seller contacted me and sent the additional parts quickly. Now they are installed! And I love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Replacing warn cheaper covers, these are a great deal at $25, the bottom clip is the key, no sliding around. My experience is no seat cover is water proof and your better off with something breathable so the seat and dry faster water under neoprene can mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Not a snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 2015 Honda Civic. Does not fit seats snug. Came w an offer for steering wheel cover. The cover was HUGE and could not be used. I guess that’s why it was drastically reduced. It appears it was meant for an over-sized steering wheel. Anyway, the seat covers are cute, but are a bit big. They have an elastic band around, but still do not fit snugly.
customer_reviews.author: SusanAnn

customer_reviews.title: Important to know
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a good product! It does not however, fit the seats of a 2016 Toyota Corolla. They stretched JUST enough to make them work. I loved the color and the softness of the Baja blanket so I did not want to send them back! And just for everyone’s information, these seat covers are NOT heavy duty nor do they seem very durable. They are however, a very lightweight, breathable, soft material. Worth the money if you are looking for comfort and a simple install.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: These aresuper cute and I love them, except for the fact that the part ...
customer_reviews.text: These aresuper cute and I love them, except for the fact that the part that goes through the middleof the seat doesnt have the hooks like the package says. So I had nothing to hook the straps to. Now it slides around. If only it had those it would have been 5 star for sure
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Poole

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Covers!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 2016 honda CR-V! Cheapest set i have bought yet and are my favorite! I have spent as much as $50+ on carseat covers and none of come close to the quality of these. They have held up very well against daily use and a 15 pound yorkie with very sharp nails.
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Taken for a ride
customer_reviews.text: I have learned to hate this product. Doesn’t work well with my Mitsubishi Outlander, part to keep seat in place keeps popping out causing seat part to bunch and be uncomfortable. The only reason I didn’t trash them is because I am hoping they work on my wife’s car
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Like the pattern
customer_reviews.text: These were okay because the installation was a little difficult because of the strapping and reaching it to a certain holding position other than that the quality is good not bad for the price wish it came with back seat covers but they didn't have any in this color that I got for the front seat
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fits 1st Gen. Ford Focus!
customer_reviews.text: I can confirm the covers fit on a first generation Ford Focus and do so quite well! (I'll try update w/ some pictures later.) The covers wrap the seat entirely and fit snugly so they don't really move much, a very desirable trait. The overall quality seems to be right on par for the price, a great value IMO. We'll see how they hold up over time but after about 3 weeks they seem to be perfectly fine. I put the included seat belt covers in the rear b/c I generally find them somewhat annoying, but they look very nice as accents for my rear seats. Awesome buy, love the unique pattern & would probably buy again!
customer_reviews.author: purps

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super-Cute and easy to install! What more could you ask for! I have an '11 Subaru Impreza and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Madison G

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great fit and appearance
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these look and they went on super easy, fit a Jeep Patriot nicely. The attachment thingy for under the seat was so much better than having to search around for something to anchor to.
customer_reviews.author: LSP

customer_reviews.title: Might go a different way
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this product. It did not come with any instructions so I had to wing it. There wasn’t a way to connect it to the back so I have it tied and the head rest covers didn’t fit
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Seat swag!
customer_reviews.text: They look great! Installation was a little tough. Getting the plastic ring on the loops under my seats took two people working together. It was well worth it, though. The fabric is stretchy and will protect from dirt. They look good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve/Ann Raz

customer_reviews.title: Cute look while getting the job done
customer_reviews.text: These have been a good product. They are still in good condition even after being washed. They are easy to install, but the under-the-seat fasteners did take a little time to get attached just due to area. Once installed, they stay in place excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Better off in the trash, looks so cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest crap I’ve ever seen, I don’t know why anyone would waste their money on these, I should have looked closer on how the back of the cover is secured. It’s embarrassing if I had kept them on my car, these belong in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Meliss

customer_reviews.title: They would not last long!
customer_reviews.text: These are flimsy seat covers! They say universal but they did not fit my seats on a Subaru forester. The only thing nice was the seatbelt covers but I am returning everything. Also the very tiny metal strap connecters were a joke. They would not fit on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Foggia

customer_reviews.title: Hideously Ugly
customer_reviews.text: I’m all for colorful prints so I selected these to cover my tea splattered seat... But when I opened the tightly packed box I was disappointed to see these were horribly ugly. Not just not my taste but objectively horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Glitterific

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: These did not work at all for my Subaru. I couldn’t get the first one on properly without actually ripping it. Just really disappointed because this was supposed to work for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gerstner

customer_reviews.title: Great value, durability
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and the print. Not sure how the elastic loops were suppose attatch under seat but I did struggle with getting them knotted together.y sister say mine and how they fit so she ordered a set also!
customer_reviews.author: jilljill

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra 20$ on a better cover.
customer_reviews.text: Not even worth the low price. Fits extremely loose. Always moves all over the place. The seams ripped in about a month. I had to sew by hand to fix the elastic that ripped off after two weeks. My car is a Kia Forte; compatible.
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2005 Corolla
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2005 Corolla perfectly. There are no holes to connect the slip that goes between the back and bottom of the seat. They included the hooks for the elastic, but they're not placed in the position to connect to the slip. Doesn't bother me though.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: For the price, as good as my $30 one's
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these worked great, easier to put on from other for more, I say, if u want to protect your seats, their great! They so far stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon truth

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my seat covers! I have white seats and was scared to sit on them. These covers were easy to install and stay in place very well. The material is soft and doesn’t itch when wearing shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Suns7ar

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: They fit about as well as you can expect universal car seats to fit, but they’re really cute and the embroidery helps with durability. I like that they’re a boho theme but in black and white. They come with seatbelt covers too, which I didn’t notice when I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good value, easy to install and they look great. I didn't use the hooks; just slipped the covers over the seats in my 2015 Toyota Prius. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality that stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so vibrant, and they match my steering wheel perfectly. I've never had seatbelt covers but it completes the look. I really like the discs that hold the covers in place, I always had issues with my covers coming off. Haven't had them long enough to test their durability. Works well with my Pontiac Vibe which is a crossover SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Becca DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Universal fit
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They fit my 2009 Corolla just fine and will keep the felt like seats cleaner. I also bought a pair for my Ford F-150 to keep from burning my ass all summer on the leather, I didn’t realize the passenger seat was both that and the middle seat so it only fits over half of it, but that is certainly not the fault of the seat cover. The drivers seat and most important seat fits.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Kelly

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and comfortable to cover up the 25-year-old seats in our old Mazda pickup. The seller sent hooks to me when I notified them that the included plastic disk did not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki G.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Fit
customer_reviews.text: I did return this item. I have a Chevy Cruze with standard fabric seats. The covers did not fit the seats at all and would not sit flat on the seat. I decided to instantly return this because I was not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great covers good quality material but trash instructions
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The only real fault I have with these is lack of proper instructions. I know these are universal so they aren't perfect snug fits. They are damn near it though. The thing that made me knock a star is the lack of good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband's truck. Look great and wear well. I will be getting them for the car next. Pattern hides the dirt. Hooks a little flimsy, just added some cheap metal curtain joins , problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail m McEnroe

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and good quality material. For the price it is a nice product for my Jeep Wrangler! Good fit on stock Jeep Wrangler front seats.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmer Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit well but material was good
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is just my car, I have a Nissan Versa, but these seat covers did not fit my seats well. The middle portion of the seat did not rest against the seat but were very loose. With that being said the material was very durable and the design was exactly what I wanted. Wouldn’t buy again but not bad enough to return. I was able to makeshift fix with some stitches here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It was a tight fit putting on my full size truck seats, but well worth it. The truck looks much better than the plain vinyl seats it came with. The seat covers also keep me from frying on the vinyl. Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my Chevy Silverado. Slipped right on, feel very durable, and look just like the pictures. Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My car seats with all their stains are no longer visible with these! They are cute, easy to install and comfortable. Have had them on for awhile now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Megan T

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: These seat covers fit very well on a 2005 Toyota Matrix. The quality is great and the seatbelt covers are very well padded. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: tigger

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little funny height-wise. Too tight, so when you sit down, your back pushes the taught fabric. But the material is comfy, and durable, and true to color. Love them! 5 star would be if the fit wasn’t a little wonky.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased these seat covers for my 2004 Saturn Ion and they are a perfect fit, were easy to slip on and attach and they look like they belong on the seats so far very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: came fast. it did not fit over the head rest in my car. i did remove my headrests & slid covers over, they fit perfect ( i'll replace head rest later) easy to pull over, easy to adjust. design & fabric are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I like them! Good for the $$
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4 or 5 pair I’ve bought for different cars, I like the look, hides everything. Thick woven fabric. I do add a couple extra 12” bungee cord to hold more securely.
customer_reviews.author: Scott f Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Not quite univeral
customer_reviews.text: Not for a Chevy Exquinox 06. Have a difficult time gething seating to stay latched at bottom with power seats. Had to rig myself to get them to semi stay put. Love the design though.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Might not be enough room for headrests.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. My headrests seem to be higher than the seat cover was made for. I’m hoping it will stretch some with use. The drivers side seat has a folding arm rest that the seat cover didn’t allow for.
customer_reviews.author: PSH

customer_reviews.title: Threw my money away.
customer_reviews.text: This was listed as fitting my vehicle and it was not even close to the truth. Absolutely would not fit and work for my car. I purchased it to protect my seat from my dogs and instead the seat cover would t stay on and my dogs slid all over my back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: They did not fit my Nissan Frontier, plus the threads were coming loose without even being used. Very poor quality. I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Litvin

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Gave an earlier review that was not 5 stars because of missing hooks to attach the covers to the seats. Seller responded right away and resolved the issue quickly. Love the quality of the material and how it feels. Great price and great product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is cute, but the rest of the material is thin like panty hose, can rip super easy and will not say on my seat, falls off and slides around constantly, super annoying, cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Aceves

customer_reviews.title: nice covers!
customer_reviews.text: these are much nicer than I expected for the price. fabric is thick and looks very durable. they fit well and look good on my geo tracker. very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: bike geezer gregg

customer_reviews.title: Love these covers
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 1999 F-250 super duty like a glove. This material is smooth - not the burlap-like material that it's intended to imitate.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Z

product_meta.title: Copap 4pc Universal Stripe Colorful Baja Front Seat Cover Baja Bucket Seat Cover Blue Saddle Blanket with Seat-Belt Pad Protectors for Car, SUV & Truck
product_meta.description:
Size:Front| Color:Style A
Copap Baja Saddle Blanket Front Seat Covers come with an extraordinary inspire of such classic Baja design, this seat cover would be a perfect choice to decorate the interior of your car. 

Moreover, 3mm breathable sponge padding disperses heat and keeps you feeling cool even under the hottest environment. 

This 4pc front seat cover set includes not only front seat covers but also seat belt protectors. 



Warranty: 30 day . 

Installation: Easy installation

Surface Finish: Smooth

Placement on Vehicle: Front seats

Size:Back size:H 31.1’’ ×W 21.6’’ Cushion size:L 19.3’’×W 21.6’’
feature_bullets: Provides a convenient way to protect a brand new seat or decorate an old one.
Premium saddle blanket material and 3mm foam padding - breathable and comfortable material.
Broad compatibility, fit most seats with built-in or adjustable headrests.
Colorful Baja flavor design, perfect choice to decorate your car front seats.
Includes 2pc Front Seat Covers & 2pc Safety Seat Belt Pad Protectors.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,865 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
